insert.OPTIONS:
zoomMin: 1,
		zoomMax: 4,
		startZoom: 1,
		// CUSTOM: Added option to prevent 'bounce/pinch' effect on Zooming
		
		zoomBounce : true,

replace._translate: this.scrollerStyle[utils.style.transform] = 'translate(' + x + 'px,' + y + 'px) scale(' + this.scale + ') ' + this.translateZ;
